member.name: R:Project
member.summary:
Shared Cache is high performance distributed cache and clustered .Net cache for enterprise application running in server farms.
Shared Cache provides distributed replicated cache to minimize the load factor. It consists the usage of two or more servers in a farm. It's replicated all data within the cluster. The big plus is simple, you have all your cache nodes on all differnet servers. In case one of your servers get restarted, it will receive all nodes automatically from its parent.
All data is available locally which minimizes the way and any Get operation is faster then to call a third system.

member.name: N:SharedCache.Notify
member.summary: it's a combination of overview and management console. It run's as a try icon near the system time. Through the notifier you receive the abiliaty to make remote restarts or to request some basic information and statistics.

member.name: N:SharedCache.Version
member.summary: This is a webservice project which populates the current active deployed version. Notify can request a status update in case there is a newer version available a message appears in the about window.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinService
member.summary: Contains some Windows Service Logics and the differnet instances and Perf. Counters.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon
member.summary: Contains common project logic and common classes.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon.Handler
member.summary: Polulates Config, Hash, Logging, Network and NetworkMessage logics. This is a common used namespace.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon.Provider.Cache
member.summary: Provides the cache provider logic for clients.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon.Provider.Server
member.summary: Provides the provider logic to replicate data to various servers.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon.Provider.Session
member.summary: Provides the session provider logic for clients.

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceCommon.SystemManagement
member.summary: Populate some system resources information like CPU / Memory

member.name: N:SharedCache.WinServiceTestClient
member.summary: Contains a sample test application with various options to demonstrate how the server works.

member.name: N:NLog.Config
member.summary: NLog is an external logging option. please google for nlog for more information.
